fields.headline: Live music booking now
fields.bodyText: Songstress and onetime Snow Patrol collaborator (don't hold that against her) Martha Wainwright is touring this December in a series of mid-sized venues to promote her new album Come Home To Mama (2-7 Dec, begins O2 Shepherd's Bush Empire, W12) … Irish pop-chart fodder The Script are heading out on an 11-date UK arena tour early next year (28 Feb–23 Mar, begins O2, Dublin). They've had to add new dates in Dublin, Belfast and London because of unexpected/unexplainable demand … Kiwi hypnagogic-pop purveyors Opossom are bringing their retro wares and So Cal surf-noir tunes to the UK (29 Oct–9 Nov, begins The Shacklewell Arms, N16) ... Those yearning for something harder should look out for Krautrock grungers Bo Ningen as they hit the road this autumn to promote their album Line The Wall (4-28 Oct, begins The Horn, St Albans) … Finally, there are still tickets available for braindance don Squarepusher's special one-off live show (20 Oct, Hackney Empire, E8), which is described as an "LED maelstrom" – yikes!
